DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE : The investigator estimate reliability , standard error measurement ( SEM ) , minimum detectable change ( MDC ) star excursion balance test ( SEBT ) child cerebral palsy ( CP ) . METHODS : Eight child CP ( four boys four girl , sixteen leg ) participate study . Each child carry SEBT assess two examiner . To determine intra-rater reliability , investigator calculate intra-class correlation coefficient ( ICC ) model ( 3,3 ) . The investigator also calculate ICC model ( 2,3 ) determine inter-rater reliability .
DOC.brief_title: The Star Excursion Balance Test : Analysis Children With Cerebral Palsy
DOC.criteria: age 4 12 year , status level II Gross Motor Function Classification System ( GMFCS ) , able understand instruction rater , history fracture sprain low limbs previous 12 month .
